message.content:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: public Fraction (String fractionString){
    fractionString = fractionString.replace("(", "");
    fractionString = fractionString.replace(")", "");
    StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(fractionString, "/");
    numerator = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
    denominator = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
}
<<<explanation>>>: The code first removes any parentheses from the input string by replacing them with an empty string. Then it uses the StringTokenizer to split the string into numerator and denominator based on the "/" delimiter. The nextToken() method is then used to parse these tokens into integers.
